```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

This repo has a bunch of materials and code snippets so that users on a Mac
can play with creating tiny fastq input files to explore how sequences
get aligned by `bwa mem` so that they can become familiar with the meaning of the
different fields in a SAM file.
